PleaseTurnYourDeviceToLandscapeMode:
Please turn your device to
landscape mode!
Please_deposit_more: Please deposit more money or lower your bet
rtpEN: The theoretical average return to player (RTP) is %rtpValue%
ARE_WILD_CAN_APPEAR: ARE WILD, CAN APPEAR ON ANY REEL AND SUBSTITUTE FOR ALL SYMBOLS.
All_prizes_are_for_combinations:
All prizes are for combinations of a kind. All prizes are for combinations left to right and right to left.
All wins pay only on lines in play. Multiple bonuses can be won in one game. Highest prize only per
pay direction. 5 of a kind prizes paid only once. Highest win only paid per selected line. Line wins
are added.
 
The paytable always shows the prizes for the currently selected bet and number of lines.
Free Spins can be won again during the Free Spins.
Free Spins are played at trigger bet and lines. Wild symbol may appear on all reels.

All game outcomes are independent and randomly determined. The actual RTP is calculated as Total
Win / Total Bet over a large number of games played and reflects the prizes awarded by a game as
a percentage of all bets made. The expected RTP can vary widely in either direction for a small
number of games due to statistical variance.

Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
Lucky Mill sectors is not equally weighted.
All_symbols_from_winning_combinations:
All symbols from winning combinations in a game will explode and new symbols fall into place.
Any new winning combination are paid. This continues until there are no wins in view.
Following_your_initial_reel_win:
Following your initial reel win, the first mushroom on the indicator will light. Every time a fall improves
the previous win, a further will be lit. When the Freefall bonus is completed,
if you have progressed far enough, the number of free spins highlighted will be awarded.
INTRO_TEXT:
(color:#ffffff)CLOVERSTONES FEATURES A DROPDOWN SYMBOLS.
(color:#fbd15e)WINNING COMBINATIONS TRIGGER SYMBOLS TO EXPLODE.
(color:#ffffff)5 OR MORE CONSECUTIVE EXPLODINGS TRIGGER FREE SPINS!
Lucky_Mill_Bonus_Game:
Lucky Mill Bonus Game is activated randomly in case of a no-win situation in the main game only.
Lucky Mill spins the Wheel until COLLECT sector is revealed.
All received multipliers are added.
